channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jack Dorsey’s Bluetooth messaging app Bitchat now on App Store
item.description: Jack Dorsey's Bitchat is now available on the App Store, but security researchers have questioned the app's privacy claims.

item.title: 7 Best Reading Lights (2025): Clip-On, Rechargeable, Portable
item.description: These WIRED-tested reading lights are perfect for cozying up with a bestseller.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Boring Company to build Tesla tunnels under Nashville
item.description: Construction could start fast -- but that speed has edangered Boring Company workers in the past.

item.title: Apple MacOS Tahoe 26: Top New Features to Try
item.description: MacOS 26 brings a slew of new features, and you can now try them out for yourself.

item.title: Nvidia Geforce RTX 5060 Review: Not Quite There
item.description: Nvidia’s usual budget winner can’t keep up with the competition this year.

item.title: Telecom giant Orange warns of disruption amid ongoing cyberattack
item.description: The telecom giant, one of the largest in the world with customers in Europe and Africa, said customers are experiencing ongoing disruption to its serv...

item.title: Get inside Disrupt: Volunteer at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: We’re looking for curious, driven volunteers to join our team at Moscone West from October 27–29, and help power one of the most iconic startup events...

item.title: Microsoft in talks to maintain access to OpenAI’s tech beyond AGI milestone
item.description: Microsoft is reportedly in advanced talks with OpenAI for a new agreement that would give it ongoing access to the startup’s technology even if OpenAI...

item.title: A Secretive US Space Plane Will Soon Test Quantum Navigation Technology
item.description: The space plane’s test flight will advance development of a new navigation technology based on electromagnetic wave interference.

item.title: Meta Is Going to Let Job Candidates Use AI During Coding Tests
item.description: Mark Zuckerberg has said vibecoding will be a major part of Meta’s engineering work in the near future.
